dcterms:creator: A. Joulin
K. Tang
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of videos downloaded from YouTube, segmented by automatic shot boundary detection, and featuring large camera motions, view-point changes, encoding artifacts, and editing effects. Ground-truth boxes are provided for a subset of the videos.
dcterms:title: YouTube-Object Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. Van Gool
C. K. I. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating object detection and classification algorithms, providing a standard benchmark for visual object classes.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. J. Lee
J. Kim
K. Grauman
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for video object segmentation, focusing on key segments that represent the objects in the video.
dcterms:title: UCF-sports Dataset
